title: HI Riot
body: Hi riot, my name its Diana, summoner name qDianaxg, for 2 weaks and a half i cant make key fragments, i try like hell to make but nothing, i have a bug or?

replies.body:
Our key fragment system was put in place to give players the ability to earn keys over time without having to buy them. While you can get as many fragments as you'll ever need with this system, players are only able to earn 12 key fragments in a 4 week period. You can check out all the details on key fragments and other hextech crafting information in our guide [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).

It looks like you've received all the fragments you can right now, but keep playing and you'll be able to get more soon!
